named-query.name: getSubDepartmentCount
named-query.query: select count(d) from Department d where d.parent.id = :departmentId

named-query.name: getAccountCount
named-query.query: select count(c) from Account c where c.department.id = :departmentId

named-query.name: getSubDepartments
named-query.query: select d from Department d where d.parent.id = :parentId

named-query.name: getChildDepartments
named-query.query: select d from Department d where d.path like :likePath and d.path != :path

named-query.name: getSubAccounts
named-query.query: select a from Account a left outer join a.department d where d.parent.id = :parentId

named-query.name: getChildAccounts
named-query.query: select a from Account a left outer join a.department d where d.path like :likePath
